title: Software Engineer II
responsibilities: Developing and maintaining an industry leading Global Forwarding application.
Creating multiple websites using cutting edge front end technologies like React and Redux.

Leading a study group focused on application performance, software design, technical skill, and software craftsmanship.

title: Programmer/Analyst

Produced an API for healthcare applications, using ASP.NET Web API and ASP.Net Core MVC.
Implemented an enterprise level messaging and eventing systems via Microsoft Azure.

title: Programmer/Analyst Intern
responsibilities: Created a cross platform Android/iOS app for clinic patients using Xamarin.

title: Mobile Development Intern
